hero.title: About HD Group
hero.subtitle: Specialized Security with Discipline and Excellence

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.text: HD Group offers private security services with experienced professionals from public and private security. Our team consists of specialists with solid training in the Brazilian Army and Rio de Janeiro Military Police, ensuring operational excellence and absolute trust in every operation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Guarantee security and tranquility through personalized solutions, with operational excellence and highly trained professionals.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be a national reference in private security and facilities services, recognized for quality, ethics and innovation in our operations.

timeline.title: Start in Brazilian Army
timeline.description: CEO David Anacleto began his career in the Brazilian Army, consolidating values such as discipline, respect for hierarchy and ethical principles that became the foundation of his entire professional performance.

timeline.title: Rio de Janeiro Military Police
timeline.description: Joined the Rio de Janeiro Military Police, where he has been working for over 14 years, accumulating vast experience in security operations and completing various specialization courses within the corporation itself.

timeline.title: HD Group Foundation
timeline.description: All the accumulated experience led to the founding of HD Group, with the purpose of offering specialized security services, supported by discipline and operational excellence.

timeline.title: 6th Course in Security and Protection of Authorities
timeline.description: Completion of the 6th Course in Security and Protection of Authorities from the National Force, establishing himself as a reference in executive protection.

timeline.title: National Public Security Force
timeline.description: Joining the National Public Security Force, further expanding practical experience in high-level operations and strengthening HD Group's credibility.

ceo.title: Leadership
ceo.name: David Anacleto
ceo.description: With over 18 years of experience in public and private security, David Anacleto is a specialist in authority protection and complex security operations. His trajectory through the Brazilian Army, Military Police and National Force consolidates HD Group as a reference in specialized security.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Complete private security solutions for every need

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Essential service for managing entry and exit at events, companies or residences, using rigorous protocols to identify and authorize access.

reception.title: Reception
reception.description: Professional service at the reception of corporate spaces, hotels or events, combining courtesy with discreet surveillance.

safetyTour.title: Safety Tour
safetyTour.description: Accompanying tourists to the destinations they desire – whether a classic city tour (e.g., Christ the Redeemer in Rio), cultural tours or personalized explorations. The guide (bilingual or not) takes care of navigation, locations and discreet security, using armored vehicles for transfers between points.

facilities.title: Facilities
facilities.description: Integrated facilities management, including building maintenance, cleaning and logistical support, with a focus on continuous security.

escort.title: Urban Cargo Vehicle Escort
escort.description: Armed and monitored protection for goods transport in urban areas, preventing theft and delays. Support vehicles with tactical team, optimized routes and anti-hijacking protocols. Reduces risk of losses with dedicated escort, increases efficiency in timely deliveries and generates satisfaction for logistics companies needing security in chaotic cities.
benefits: Strategic planning: Route analysis, risk identification and definition of safe routes
Tactical team: Armed professionals trained in security logistics and rapid incident response
Guaranteed delivery: Real-time monitoring to final destination, with zero tolerance for deviations or losses

armored.title: Armored Vehicle Operations – VIPs
armored.description: Secure transport for authorities, executives and VIPs using own fleet of armored vehicles, including escorts and transfers. Provides elite security in high-risk scenarios, ensuring efficiency with total discretion (without drawing attention), and maximizes satisfaction with premium comfort and absolute privacy. Satellite tracking, alternative route planning and coordination with security forces if needed. Perfect for events, travel or high-profile daily life.
benefits: Premium fleet: Latest generation armored vehicles, level III-A or higher, with rigorous maintenance and anti-hijacking technology
Specialized drivers: Drivers trained in defensive and evasive driving and security protocols in critical situations
Tracking: 24-hour GPS monitoring with control center and immediate response to any detected anomaly

hero.title: Safety School Project
hero.subtitle: School Security with Method and Protocol

intro.title: What is Safety School
intro.description: Safety School is a complete school security program developed to organize access control, prevent occurrences and prepare teams to act with speed, clarity and protocol in risk situations. Our goal is to ensure that students, staff and families have a calm, protected and structured school environment.

about.title: School Security with Method
about.description: Safety School goes beyond physical presence. It is a structured model of prevention and response, based on diagnosis, clear protocols and continuous training. We act from prevention to incident response, creating a security culture within the institution.

context.title: The School Security Challenge
context.subtitle: School environments are subject to various risks

items.title: Violence and Negligence
items.description: Physical, psychological, sexual or institutional violence, negligence and abandonment that compromise student well-being.

items.title: Bullying and Cyberbullying
items.description: Growing cases of harassment, sexual exploitation, human trafficking and other forms of violence among students.

items.title: Kidnapping and Confinement
items.description: Risks of kidnapping and illegal confinement that require clear security and rapid response protocols.

items.title: Armed Attacks
items.description: Entry of armed children or adolescents (firearms, knives, among others) and real cases like the one that occurred in Realengo.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To prepare people capable of understanding and serving our clients with maximum excellence. To ensure that citizens have their rights preserved in private environments, relying on professionals ready to act whenever necessary.

objective.title: Project Objective
objective.description: Ensure a safe, organized school environment prepared for emergencies, with clear protocols, trained staff and consolidated prevention culture.

items.title: Intelligent Access Control
items.description: Organized entry and exit • Badge identification • Visitor control • Delivery management

items.title: Monitoring & Response
items.description: Monitoring center • Preventive patrols • Quick activation • Incident logging

items.title: Prevention Culture
items.description: Clear protocols • Continuous training • Periodic drills • School team preparation

steps.title: Complete diagnosis and risk map
steps.description: Detailed analysis of the school to identify vulnerabilities and create personalized security strategies.

steps.title: Protocols defined by scenario
steps.description: Specific procedures for entry, visitors, incidents and emergencies adapted to the institution's reality.

steps.title: Team training
steps.description: Continuous training of reception and coordination staff in security protocols, first aid and crisis management.

steps.title: Periodic drills
steps.description: Regular practical exercises to test protocols and prepare the entire school community for real situations.

steps.title: Reports and incident logging
steps.description: Detailed documentation of all occurrences with data analysis for continuous improvement. Everything adapted to each institution's reality.

items.title: Inspectors who ARE Protocol
items.description: Our inspectors are not just presence — they are protocol. Professionals trained to follow procedures with excellence.

items.title: Access Control
items.description: Specialized training in entry and exit management, identification and authorization with rigorous protocols.

items.title: Emergency Management
items.description: Training in rapid response to critical situations, evacuation coordination and activation of emergency protocols.

items.title: First Aid
items.description: Team trained for immediate assistance in accidents and situations requiring quick intervention until rescue arrives.

items.title: Fire Prevention and Fighting
items.description: Complete training in equipment use, escape routes and evacuation procedures in case of fire.

items.title: Process and Consistency
items.description: Real security is built with process, preparation and consistency. Methodology applied daily for effective results.

cta.title: Transform your school's security
cta.description: Contact us and discover how Safety School can protect your institution with method and professionalism.
